name: Naturalizer Women's, Areda Sandal
product_description: Non-stop comfort. This easy-going sandal makes a stylish statement with its contemporary cork bottom and sleek wedge silhouette. Wear what moves you. Comfy chic wedge sandal with a light cork bottom. Manmade/fabric or manmade upper with a round toe. Adjustable hook-and-loop closure. Contour+ technology for a premium fit and all-day comfort experience. Non-slip outsole. 2 3/4 inch(es) cork heel. Consciously packaged: 100% of our shoe boxes are made of 80% recycled paper + soy-based ink. Designed using sustainable materials. WHY YOU'LL LOVE IT: Ingenious elegant utility. All-day heels that scale the height of chic with endless versatility and comfort that is downright clever. Available in an inclusive size range of tough-to-find sizes and widths for a custom-designed fit and feel for all-day wear. The Shoe With the Beautiful Fit. Since 1927.

name: Skechers Women's BEVERLEE - Sail Away
product_description: Elevate your sunny-day style with the Beverlee Sail Away wedge sandals. These casual sandals feature a sophisticated three-strap design with metal ring accents, perfect for those seeking womens sandals that blend style and comfort. The canvas and synthetic upper sits atop a natural cork veneer wedge heel, while the Luxe Foam cushioned footbed ensures all-day comfort. With a 2 1/4 inch wedge height and flexible traction outsole, these sandals for women offer both stability and elegance for any occasion.
